document.full_text: kia motors corp is recalling more than 70,000 optima sedans because the shift cable may have been installed incorrectly and cause parked vehicles to roll away.
document.title: kia recalls more than 70,000 optima sedans
lines_and_colors: kia motors corp is recalling more than 70,000 optima sedans because the shift cable may have been installed incorrectly and cause parked vehicles to roll away.
